page.title: 09FACTORIES IN ROADE
page.content: THE BIGGEST FACTORY IN ROADE IS IN ASHTON ROAD.IT IS CALLED PIANOFORTE SUPPLIES LTD. ABOUT NINE HUNDRED AND FIFTY PEOPLE WORK THERE. DIFFERENT NUMBERS OF PEOPLE WORK THERE,DEPENDING ON HOW BUSY THEY ARE. THEY MAKE SOME OF THE SMALL FITTINGS FOR CARS.THESE INCLUDE VINYL MOULDINGS, WHEEL TRIMS,HINGES,DRIP WAY MOULDINGS AND CHROME TRIMMINGS. CHAPLINS TRANSPORT COMPANY DO A LOT OF WORK CARRYING PARTS FROM ROADE TO OTHER FACTORIES IN THE MIDLANDS. WALKERPACK LTD. PACK GOODS FOR OTHER FIRMS.THEY TAKE THEM TO OTHER PLACES IN BRITAIN AND EUROPE. ( BY GARY STIMPSON )
